Title: Supply and Delivery of Memorial Benches
Description:
Halton Borough Council invites quotations from suitably experienced Suppliers to supply and deliver Memorial Benches for use in Cemeteries within the borough. To view the full specification and requirement, please register your interest in this opportunity by visiting www.the-chest.org.uk and searching project id DN329268.
All questions must be raised via the messaging facility with in the Chest.
Closing date for questions is Monday 19 March 2018 at 3pm.
Closing date for submissions is Wednesday 21 March 2018 at 3pm.
